function	script	AdvCostumeBox	{
	setarray .CostumeItems[0],
49112,49113,49114,49115,49116,49117,49118,49119,49120,49121,49122,49123,49124,49125,49126,49127,49128,49129,49130,49131,49132,49133,49134,49135,49136,
49137,49138,49139,49140,49141,49142,49143,49144,49145,49146,49147,49148,49149,49150,49151,49152,49153,49154,49155,49156,49157,49158,49159,49160,49161,
49162,49163,49164,49165,49166,49167,49168,49169,49170,49171,49172,49173,49174,49175,49176,49177,49178,49179,49180,49181,49182,49183,49184,49185,49186,
49187,49188,49189,49190,49191,49192,49193,49194,49195,49196,49197,49198,49199,49200,49201,49202,49203,49204,49205,49206,49207,49208,49209,49210,49211,
49212,49213,49214,49215,49216,49217,49218,49219,49220,49221,49222,49223,49224,49225,49226,49227,49228,49229,49230,49231,49232,49233,49234,49235,49236,
49237,49238,49239,49240,49241,49242,49243,49244,49245,49246,49247,49248,49249,49250,49251,49252,49253,49254,49255,49256,49257,49258,49259,49260,49261,
49262,49263,49264,49265,49266,49267,49268,49269,49270,49271,49272,49273,49274,49275,49276,49277,49278,49279,49280,49281,49282,49283,49284,49285,49286,
49287,49288,49289,49290,49291,49292,49293,49294,49295,49296,49297,49298,49299,49300,49301,49302,49303,49304,49305,49306,49307,49308,49309,49310,49311,
49312,49313,49314,49315,49316,49317,49318,49319,49320,49321,49322,49323,49324,49325,49326,49327,49328,49329,49330,49331,49332,49333,49334,49335,49336,
49337,49338,49339,49340;

	set .Random, getarraysize( .CostumeItems );
	getitem .CostumeItems[ rand( .Random ) ], 1;
	end;
}
